title: PIXEL 4 XL Battery connector broke. 2nd time
content:
Hey peeps,
I really like my Pixel 4 XL. The connector of the battery to the motherboard has broken, for a second time in one year.
I now have two batteries that are unusable because the connector of both have broken. Is this a known defect of Pixel 4 XL?
I am spending 2021 hiding from COVID in a different country. The country I am in do not sell Pixel batteries.
Any ideas on how to fix this issue?
Should I contact google?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
